original: Fritz, Karl Herbert Birger, disponent, Nässjö, f. 28/1/11 i Nässjö av disp. Albert F. o. Lowa Gustafsson. G. 37 m. Ruth Ohlin. Barn: Lars f. 40, Karin 46. — Stud:ex. 31, DHS i Gbg 34. Anst. v. A-B Nässjö Vaddfabrik^er sed. 34, verkst. dir. sed. 38, verkst. dir. v. A-B Nässjö Lådfabrik s. å. Led. av styr. f. A-B Nässjö Vaddfabriker fr. 35, A-B Nässjö Lådfabrik fr. 38, A-B Tekn. Fabr. Thor fr. 38, A-B Nyhem fr. 38, A-B Bostäd. i Nässjö fr. s. å.
translated: Fritz, Karl Herbert Birger, manager, Nässjö, born on January 28, 1911 in Nässjö to manager Albert F. and Lowa Gustafsson. Married in 1937 to Ruth Ohlin. Children: Lars born in 1940, Karin born in 1946. Completed high school in 1931 and studied at DHS in Gothenburg from 1931 to 1934. Employed by A-B Nässjö Vaddfabrik from 1934, appointed as managing director in 1938, and as managing director of A-B Nässjö Lådfabrik in the same year. He was a member of the board of directors of A-B Nässjö Vaddfabriker from 1935, A-B Nässjö Lådfabrik from 1938, A-B Tekn. Fabr. Thor from 1938, A-B Nyhem from 1938, and A-B Bostäd. in Nässjö from the same year.
